column1: systems and methods are provided for sample processing. a device may be provided, capable of receiving the sample, and performing one or more of a sample preparation, sample assay, and detection step. the device may be capable of performing multiple assays. the device may comprise one or more modules that may be capable of performing one or more of a sample preparation, sample assay, and detection step. the device may be capable of performing the steps using a small volume of sample.
